item.description:
So I am putting up this quicky posting on a whim. I am scheduling a non hiking social event for Friday night. I am thinking snacks without turkey, games, or movie, or just plain old socializing. Friday isn't bringing the best weather but we can have a fun social evening.

Plan on bringing a snack to share. Thing could include drinks. Please post what you will bring with your response. This is at private residence in South Windsor. I will send the address to those who respond.

I hope you can attend and enjoy a warm evening with great people.

Happy Holidays

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Non-cardio socializing with Janice
